Dark One/Nemesis Enforcer:



Dark One saw Striker and co retreating like frightened children.  Bringing up 
his targeting scanners, he fired twenty rapid lasers at a tree trunk, the 
tree blowing apart at the base and he3ading down towards Ramhorn and Striker.

=====

Nemesis, at the bridge of the Alliance base, detected mutliple signatures at 
the Ark.  <Zardus, a ton of robots are at the Ark.  I'm going to see what it 
is>  transforming to his bad mode, he activated the boosters in his feet.  
Rocketing him off through the air, he flew towards the coordinates of the ARk.
